name: Yahoo Japan old version (HTML base) mail
description:
Yahoo!メールのHTML版です。
ほとんどの広告は無くなっていると思いますが何かあれば教えて下さい。

ついにJavascriptをオンにしないと使えなくなったようです。
他のstyleで十分だと思いますが気がついた時に対応します。2014/6/19

画面サイズが広ければ読みやすくなるようにしたつもりです。2014/7/21
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("mail.yahoo.co.jp") {
/* CSS Document */
/*
===== CSS Information ====================================

Name         Yahoo! mail old version (HTML base) http://mail.yahoo.co.jp/
create       2009/09/30 - nethack
lastupdate   2012/03/10 - nethack
Ver          1.1

Change history
Ver 1.0 1st release
Ver 1.1 Update due to UI change

==========================================================
*/

[style="display:block;width:100%;height:auto;clear:both;margin:0 0 10px 0;padding:0;background-image:none;background-color:#fff;line-height:1.2;overflow:hidden;text-align:left;"],
[class=jp_ads_im_msgpane_header],
[class=jp_ads_im_msgpane],
[id=theAd],
[id=jp_ads_im_fullpage_msglist],
[id="jphkrwelcomeymtools"],
[id="jp_ymail_freebanner_right1"],
[id="YSP"],
#ULT_ADS,
[style="display:block;width:100%;height:auto;clear:both;margin:0;padding:0;background-image:none;background-color:#fff;line-height:1.2;overflow:hidden;text-align:left;"],
[style="margin: 10px 5px 0 0;padding: 0;background-image:none;background-color:#E6F1FF;font-size:100%;font-size:12px;line-height:1.25em;text-align:left;margin-bottom:10px;display: block;clear: both; overflow:hidden; width:100%;"],
[style="margin:0;padding:0;background-image:none;line-height:1;overflow:hidden;"],
iframe[id="SQB"],
iframe[id="LREC"],
#jp_ymail_promo_right,
[style="margin: 0 5px 0 0;padding: 0;background-image:none;background-color:#E6F1FF;font-size:100%;font-size:12px;line-height:1.25em;text-align:left;margin-bottom:10px;display: block;clear: both; overflow:hidden; width:100%;"],
[style="margin: 10px 0 0 0;padding: 0;background-image:none;background-color:#E6F1FF;font-size:100%;font-size:12px;line-height:1.25em;text-align:left;margin-bottom:10px;display: block;clear: both; overflow:hidden; width:100%;"],
[style="margin-bottom:8px;"],
img[width="425"],
div#NW_ADS,
div#LB_ADS,
[style="margin: 0 5px 0 0; padding: 0;background-image:none;background-color:#E6F1FF;font-size:100%;font-size:12px;line-height:1.25em;text-align:left;margin-bottom:10px;display: block;clear: both; overflow:hidden; width:100%;"],
html>body>div#doc3.yui-t1>div#bd>div#yui-main>div#pageContent.yui-b>div.roundcorner>div#rightContainer>div#monad.floatright>div#MON table>tbody>tr>td,
html>body>div#networkHeader>div#universalheader>div#UHD8>form>div#uhdMain,
html>body>div#doc3.yui-t1>div#bd>div#yui-main>div#pageContent.yui-b>div.roundcorner>div#rightContainer>div#lrecad.floatright>div#LREC>table#lrecbox>tbody>tr>td,
[id="jpwelcomeyminfo"],
div#SQB,
[style="margin: 10px 0 0 0; padding: 0;background-image:none;background-color:#E6F1FF;font-size:100%;font-size:12px;line-height:1.25em;text-align:left;margin-bottom:10px;display: block;clear: both; overflow:hidden; width:100%;"],
div#northbanner,
table[id="jpwelcomeinsideyahoo"],
html>body>table>tbody>tr>td>table>tbody>tr>td[width="250"],
html>body>table>tbody>tr>td>center,
html>body>table>tbody>tr>td[width="100%"]>table>tbody>tr>td[align="center"],
html>body>table>tbody>tr>td[width="100%"]>table>tbody>tr>td[valign="top"]>table>tbody>tr>td[align="center"]

{
 display: none !important;
}

    [id="shellcontent"]
{
float: left !important;
margin: 0 0 !important;
width: 780px !important;
}

}
